Commands.Target:
return [
  "[Reviewer_Name],

We’d like to apologize for anything less than a positive experience with us. We’ve taken your feedback and will work hard to implement the needed changes at [Location_Name]. I’d love to make things right! Please reach out to me at your earliest convenience.

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title], [Company_Email]",
  "Dear [Reviewer_Name],

We are so sorry we did not meet your expectations. We’d love to make this situation right and provide a solution that will result in a more positive experience. I hope to hear from you soon.

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title], [Company_Email]",
  "Dear [Reviewer_Name],

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for the experience you had at [Location_Name] and want to work to provide a solution for you. Please feel free to contact me at [Company_Phone]; I’d love to learn more about the situation and how we can fix it.

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "[Reviewer_Name],

I’m so sorry — it sounds like we missed the mark on your experience at [Location_Name]. Can we make it up to you? Please reach out to me directly at [Company_Email].

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "Dear [Reviewer_Name],

We hear you. Thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We apologize for the experience you had at [Location_Name] and want to fix it. Reach me directly at [Company_Phone].

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "[Reviewer_Name],

Even though we did not meet your expectations, we appreciate your rating. We hope to learn from your candid feedback and make things right. Please let me know how I can make it up to you. Feel free to contact me directly at [Company_Email]

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "[Reviewer_Name],

Thank you for letting us know about your experience. Your feedback — negative or positive — helps [Location_Name] improve. We are looking into this issue and hope to make it up to you. Feel free to call me at [Company_Phone]

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "[Reviewer_Name],

It sounds like your experience at [Location_Name] did not meet your expectations or the standard of service we provide to our customers. We hope we can make it up to you — please reach out to me at [Company_Email] at your earliest convenience!

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "Dear [Reviewer_Name],

We take your experience with us very seriously and sincerely apologize for any disappointment. We will be looking into this further. Please contact me at [Company_Email]. I hope to work with you to resolve any issues as soon as possible.

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]",
  "[Reviewer_Name],

We apologize for your experience with us at [Location_Name]. We hope to connect with you soon to provide a better experience than the [rating] rated service you received. Please reach out to me directly at [Company_Email] so I can make it right!

[Contact_Name], [Contact_Title]"
